alert.note: Alert for Foard; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:14AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Foard and Knox Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 314 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Paducah to near Grow to 7 miles west of Guthrie. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Knox City, Crowell, Benjamin, Truscott, Gilliland, and Copper Breaks State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
